abstract: New York City Ballet displays works by visual artist Dustin Yellin in promenade of David H Koch Theater as part of third annual Art Series, which is designed to attract new audience to dance.
lead_paragraph: The third annual Art Series, which invites artists to install large-scale works in the David H. Koch Theater, ends on Friday.

headline.main: New York City Ballet Applies a Surreal Touch to Build Audiences
headline.print_headline: A Surreal Touch to Build Audiences for a Night of Ballet

snippet: The third annual Art Series, which invites artists to install large-scale works in the David H. Koch Theater, ends on Friday.
